# Task Discovery Advanced Project

Advanced task discovery with full automation and analytics.

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md). Good first issues are [here](https://github.com/project/issues?q=label:good-first-issue).

## Development

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```
